properties.Name: BusinessMetric
properties.Description: A financial or performance metric or measurement that provides information about the performance or financial status of the organization, corporation or business unit.

Columns.Name: BusinessMetricId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a business metric.

Columns.Name: BusinessMetricName
Columns.Description: The name of a Business Metric.

Columns.Name: BusinessMetricDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Business Metric.

Columns.Name: BusinessMetricAlgorithm
Columns.Description: The algorithm used to calculate a Business Metric.

Columns.Name: BusinessMetricTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Business Metric Type.

Columns.Name: KeyPerformanceIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the metric is always considered to be a key performance indicator.
